name: NOMAiQ
0:
”Alexa turn on all the lights”
”Alexa turn on the air purifier”
”Alexa set the purifier to auto”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
For NOMA iQ products, you can now use Alexa to control lights, plugs, purifiers, humidifiers, etc. with ease of voice. This skill requires the smart home solution from NOMA iQ; please register using the NOMA iQ app available on both Android and Apple. Currently, the support includes lights, a switch, plugs, humidifiers, and purifiers. You would need to sign in on the NOMA iQ app to use the skill feature.

Here is a step by step guide to start controlling your NOMA iQ products with Alexa: 
1. Download the "NOMA iQ" app from the App Store or Google Play to your mobile device
2. Launch the NOMA iQ app and register a new account or login if you’re already registered
3. Install your NOMA iQ product and pair it with the NOMA iQ app by following the in-app instructions
4. Rename your product in the NOMA iQ app so that Alexa will recognize that specific device with that name
5. Download the Amazon "Alexa" app from Google Play or iOS App Store and connect your smart speaker with the "Alexa" app
6. Search the Alexa skills directory for "NOMA iQ" Alexa Smart Home skill
7. Click "Enable skill”, then enter your NOMA iQ account username, password on the linking page
8. Finalize the device discovery in the Alexa app. You can also say "Alexa, discover devices” and wait until Alexa says "Discovery is completed"
9. The setup is now done, and you can start talking to Alexa to control all your NOMA iQ products.

Invocation examples: 
Alexa turn on the outdoor light
Alexa turn off the outdoor light 
Alexa set the bedroom bulb to 50 percent
Alexa brighten the bedroom bulb
Alexa dim the bedroom bulb
Alexa set the living room bulb to green 
Alexa set the reading room to warm white
Alexa set the reading room to soft white
Alexa set the reading room to white
Alexa set the reading room to daylight
Alexa set the reading room to cool
Alexa make the reading room light warmer
Alexa make the reading room light whiter
Alexa set the purifier to auto
Alexa set the purifier to fast
Alexa set the purifier to medium
Alexa set the purifier to slow
Alexa set the humidifier to fast
Alexa set the humidifier to medium
Alexa set the humidifier to slow
